verbs.description: [ARG0: EU chief Jean Claude Juncker] [ARGM-TMP: today] [V: met] [ARG1: the Chinese foreign minister] [ARGM-TMP: as Brussels prepares retaliation for new US trade tariffs] , and Beijing blasts Trump for ' protectionism ' .
